description.en: The New Conglomerate's Mag-Cutter features a powerful electromagnet capable of cutting through enemy body armor.
The versatile standard-issue NC4 Mag-Shot was the first pistol to utilize Gauss technology. NC use only.
The AF-19 Mercenary became the standard issue carbine for the NC due to its low production costs. It features controllable recoil that makes it effective at close to medium ranges. NC use only.
The standard issue NC1 Gauss Rifle was the first successful implementation of coilgun technology in small arms. NC use only.
A signal-emitting beacon that allows squad members to drop pod into an area from low orbit.
The Chainblade knife's razor sharp teeth have proven extremely effective in close quarters combat.
The standard assault rifle of the Terran Republic, the T1 Cycler features a 40-round magazine and a fast rate of fire, allowing it to remain effective in most situations. TR use only.
The reliable TX1 Repeater is the latest iteration of a firearm design stretching back 300 years. Its 3-round burst fire mode provides considerable stopping power at close range. TR use only.
Boosts movement servo power, allowing the MAX to sprint through enemy fire.
Boosts movement servo power, allowing the MAX to sprint through enemy fire.
Boosts movement servo power, allowing the MAX to sprint through enemy fire.
The Vanu Sovereignty's Force Blade emits highly charged particles from its cutting edge which are extremely destructive to organic tissue.
The Pulsar VS1 is the standard issue assault rifle for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its low recoil design allows it to remain effective in most situations. VS use only.
The Beamer VS3 is the standard sidearm for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its high rate of fire allows the user to eliminate nearby targets quickly. VS use only.
Skirmisher Jump Jets provide balanced thrust, mobility, fuel capacity, and recharge rate, allowing them to adapt to most situations.

Generates a dense mesh of nanites around the soldier that decays slowly while active, and absorbs up to 450 damage before failing. Regenerates to full in 31 seconds.

Designed with a lightning-quick receiver, the fully-automatic AS16 Nighthawk features a higher rate of fire than typical shotguns. TR use only.
Originally designed for spec-ops missions that can contain any number of situations, the TRAC-5's adaptability make it a solid choice for any soldier. TR use only.
The versatile Solstice VE3 is an effective carbine suitable for most situations. VS use only.

The sleek, compact design of the GR-22 improves handling when firing on the move, making it an excellent choice for close quarters combat. NC use only.
The NC6 Gauss SAW's low production cost, reliability, and sheer stopping power lead to wide-spread adoption of the weapon in the Auraxian War's early years. NC use only.
Aptly named, the  T9 CARV's rate of fire allows it to cut through whole groups of enemies before needing to reload. TR use only.

The Orion VS54 is the standard issue LMG for Vanu Heavy Assault soldiers. Its lightweight construction allows for more accurate hip fire and stability when on the move when compared to most weapons in its class. VS use only.
The unguided Shrike rocket launcher is equipped with high-explosive warheads and has both anti-personnel and anti-armor capabilities. NC use only.
The ML-7 launches unguided rockets that are effective against both infantry and armor. TR use only.
The Solar-1 rocket launcher fires a bolt of superheated plasma capable of melting infantry, MAXes and vehicle armor. VS use only.
An upgraded version of the successful NC11, the magazine-fed NC14 Bolt Driver is common on the battlefield due to its versatility and high stopping power. NC use only.

The 99SV is the standard issue semi-automatic sniper rifle of TR Infiltrators. An accurized variant of the DMR-99, the 99SV allows the shooter to hit multiple follow-up shots at long range. TR use only.
The VA39 Spectre semi-automatic sniper rifle is the standard squad support weapon of Vanu Sovereignty Infiltrators. VS use only.

Nanite Systems' first attempts into close-range weaponry resulted in the powerful Baron G5. The tube fed Baron is able to put down targets at longer ranges than typical shotguns thanks to its narrow choke.
Auraxis Firearms launched the Fortuna Mercenary for the discerning soldier of fortune that prefers close-quarters combat without having to give up their shotgun.
Co-developed with Genudine's Offense Development team, the NC6A GODSAW incorporates an alternate firing mode which allows the weapon to pierce heavy armor in exchange for reduced infantry damage.

Exemplary of NC ingenuity and their utter disdain for rules, the aftermarket parts welded into the Brawler not only make it more accurate than typical shotguns, but also illegal to possess in the Terran Republic. Not that they care.

The Auraxium variant of the NC4, The Executive is typically only issued to the enigmatic members of The Board, the New Conglomerate's governing body. It features a unique low-velocity suppressor that doesn't affect stopping power at range.

Orion's largest star also shines brightly as a powerful, accurate LMG capable of sustained suppressing fire. Plagued by multiple redesigns during its troubled development, the third and final iteration proved itself as a favorite amongst the VS.
Custom-built for Sigma Squad's infamous Hossin Rebirth mission, the unique Tempest SMG performs similar as a carbine at long distances.
The TR released the Unity to commemorate the time-tested Cycler assault rifle, a key weapon attributed to helping bring Earth together under the Terran Republic's harmonious rule.
Built off of the Pulsar assault rifle, the long-range Darkstar was named after the notorious squad of designated marksman medics that popularized its use.

Though not officially sanctioned for use on the field, the TR has turned a blind eye to the use of the TRAC-Shot. Bolted together by TR mechanics in their downtime, the TRAC-Shot's multiple rail attachments are unconventional but effective.
The Eclipse easily overshadows its predecessor, the Solstice, as a close-quarters combat king. It comes equipped with an underbarrel plasma shotgun for ambushes and last-ditch scenarios.

The Butcher gained its reputation as a fearsome weapon capable of unending, long-range suppressive fire following a series of extended engagements at The Crown. Built on the CARV platform, the Butcher's notoriety has been earned over time in blood.

The TR's infamous Havoc Squad popularized this shotgun loadout enough to have it put into production. Primarily used with behind-the-lines galaxy drops to secure CCs, the Havoc can clear rooms and hold points with the best of them.
Named for the pandemonium this highly modified plasma-core shotgun can cause in a surprise ambush, the Chaos' reputation as a very deadly flanking weapon has been well earned.

Designed for use by the Terran Republic's top Infiltrator hit squads, the Shuriken's incredible flexibility both close-up and at a distance allowed TR assassins to deal with a multitude of situations they may've not survived otherwise.
The Skorpios was created as an outdoor SMG to bolster the survivability of the Vanu Sovereignty's frightening Wraith squads when their cloaked Flashes were past running condition.

This Auraxium-clad variant of the TX1 Repeater is a replica of former Terran Republic President Connery's weapon of choice. Equipped with a special suppressor, this silenced pistol remains effective even at longer ranges.

Commissioned by the undying founder of the Vanu Sovereignty for use as his own personal sidearm, Briggs' variant of the Beamer, The Immortal, features an integrated suppressor that retains stopping power even at a distance.

Nanite Systems' mightiest anti-tank weapon received a facelift with the release of The Kraken, a commemorative Auraxium-plated Decimator. Its powerful warheads create a miniaturized singularity upon impact.

An experimental prototype based off the EM4 resulted in the Moonshot, a hyper-long range bolt-action sniper rifle. While stealth is not the Moonshot's specialty, the speed at which it can drop even the farthest targets offsets its drawbacks.

The TRs' Bighorn .50M surpassed the RAMS as the heaviest sniper rifle in their arsenal. Boasting an unmatched bullet velocity and a straight-pull bolt for rapid shots, the deafening crack of the Bighorn is a warning to distant soldiers.

Built from a highly-tinkered Parallax, the Parsec was the brainchild of a small group of engineers looking for long-range perfection. Though significantly louder than most sniper rifles, it drops targets before the sound wave even reaches them.

Genudine's heavily modified Guardian rifle was initially designed for long-range support for Heavy Assault soldiers ambushing from on high or in cover. Deadly from even long distances, the accurate Guardian can drop targets from afar with ammo to spare.

Though currently not in production, the Terran Republic's powerful DMR-99 has a dedicated following of designated marksmen that stick by their tried-and-true battle rifle, rather than switch to a newer model.

A favorite of Vanu anti-vehicle support soldiers, the unique Revenant battle rifle is excellent at dropping enemies that have bailed to escape their doomed vehicle following a coordinated Lancer strike.
The awe-inspiring stopping power of the accurate NS-44 Commissioner revolver can put down even mid-range targets with a few well-placed shots. All factions can use this weapon.
The powerful Hunter QCX Quad-Cam crossbow is a lightweight sidearm, capable of silently taking out targets up to medium range with deadly precise bolts.
The powerful Heartstring Quad-Cam crossbow is a lightweight sidearm, capable of silently taking out targets up to medium range with deadly precise bolts.
The powerful Blackheart Quad-Cam crossbow is a lightweight sidearm, capable of silently taking out targets up to medium range with deadly precise bolts.

The C85-H fires a canister of heavy shrapnel that is effective against infantry and light armor. NC use only.
The Proton II PPA-H fires large orbs of volatile plasma that explode on impact.  The PPA is effective against infantry and light armor. VS use only.
The Saron HRB fires a fast and accurate armor damaging particle beam. Accuracy destabilizes for a split second after each shot.  VS use only.

The M20 Wyvern has superior RPM and faster reload compared to other M20 heavy machine guns but at the cost of a smaller magazine. Like other M20 HMGs, its 20mm rounds are capable of damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

The M20 Wyvern has superior RPM and faster reload compared to other M20 heavy machine guns but at the cost of a smaller magazine. Like other M20 HMGs, its 20mm rounds are capable of damaging all targets. All factions can use this weapon.

The CAS 14-E is designed to provide close air support using its 14mm explosive rounds and high magazine capacity to effectively eliminate hostile personnel. All factions can use this weapon.
The CAS 14-E is designed to provide close air support using its 14mm explosive rounds and high magazine capacity to effectively eliminate hostile personnel. All factions can use this weapon.

The Hellion G20 chain gun fires special armor piercing 20mm rounds that are effective against vehicles at close range. It takes 1.5 seconds for the G20 to spool up and reach full firing speed. All factions can use this weapon.

The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.
The Pelter Rocket Pod launches a barrage of unguided anti-armor rockets which have little explosive yield. All factions can use this weapon.

The VLG fires a laser guided missile that seeks toward the gunner's crosshairs. The missile is effective against armor on direct hits and produces a moderate blast. Missile will detonate after traveling 400 meters. All factions can use this weapon.

The VLG fires a laser guided missile that seeks toward the gunner's crosshairs. The missile is effective against armor on direct hits and produces a moderate blast. Missile will detonate after traveling 400 meters. All factions can use this weapon.

The Gauss Rifle Burst features the same versatility as the NC1, but with an easily controllable burst fire mode. NC use only.
The Gauss Rifle S possesses a select fire option that allows for further adaptability on the battlefield. NC use only.
Designed in the late 28th century for close quarters and mid-range combat scenarios, the Carnage AR features high hip fire accuracy and an adaptable attachment system. NC use only.

The NC's A-Tross was created as the ultimate in heavy-hitting, long-range assault rifles. Featuring a 30-round magazine and an overclocked propulsion coil firing a high-damage projectile, the A-Tross can drop targets at even distant ranges.
The powerful and accurate Reaper DMR was developed to fulfill the needs of soldiers who prefer to provide support from a distance. NC use only.

The Cycler TRV's fast rate of fire makes it extremely effective in close quarters, though that same rate of fire and high recoil limits its effectiveness at long range when firing in full-auto. TR use only.

The SABR-13's two-round burst fire mode was originally developed with ammunition conservation in mind. It has since become popular with marksmen because of its ability to reliably land those two rounds on target from long range. TR use only.
The versatile T1B Cycler is nearly identical to the original, with an added accurate burst fire mode. TR use only.
The T1S Cycler performs well at many ranges, attributing its adaptability due to its multiple fire modes. TR use only.
Many TR soldiers praise the Terran Assault Rifle's performance in the field, crediting many victories to its incredible hip fire accuracy and high rate of fire. TR use only.

The Terran Operations Rifle is a favorite amongst TR who feel at home with an all-around performer. Deadly accurate with fast reload assists for its 40 round magazine, the TORQ-9's versatility and ease of use make it a solid choice in combat.
The H-V45 was created with a focus on close quarters mobility. Its light weight does not slow the shooter as much as most other weapons in its class. VS use only.
The CME's high projectile velocity and good accuracy make it a very effective weapon at medium and long ranges. VS use only.
Vanu Esamir Labs created the Equinox VE2 Burst to provide easily controllable burst fire for distant targets. VS use only.
The versatile Equinox VE2 assault rifle was designed to perform well in many situations. VS use only.
The Corvus VA55 features low recoil and high accuracy over sustained fire, making it a popular choice for long range engagements. VS use only.

The Vanu's shadowy VX Labs launched the Terminus VX-9 shortly after joining the war. Engineered with advanced cooling systems that allow for its high rate of fire, the Terminus allows users to hold their ground at close-to-medium ranges.
Genudine Dynamics' initial venture into carbines produced the GD-7F. Its high rate of fire makes it an effective weapon in close quarter combat situations. NC use only.
The powerful AC-X11 was released shortly before Auraxis' global war yet still remains in common use due to its famed reliability and high stopping power. NC use only.
The NC2B Gauss Compact features a burst fire mode for controllable long range fire. NC use only.
The NC2S Gauss Compact possesses a select-fire mode that further diversifies the usage of the already adaptable carbine. NC use only.

Genudine Dynamics unveiled the Razor GD-23 in the early 29th century. The Razor quickly became popular due to its high accuracy and controllable recoil, allowing it to outperform other carbines at long distances. NC use only.

Designed with mobility in mind, the lightweight alloys that make up Auraxis Firearm's AF-A4 Bandit allows for faster movement while aiming without compromising on stopping power in close to medium ranges.
The T5 AMC's damage output and controllable recoil was designed around giving Terran Republic soldiers increased effectiveness in medium range encounters. TR use only.
The burst fire variant of the TRAC-5 provides accurate and controllable firepower suitable for any number of situations. TR use only.
Created to further enhance the carbine's versatility, the TRAC-5 S can choose between multiple fire modes for firing at distant targets. TR use only.
Boasting a longer barrel than its compact Light Carbine cousin, the mobile LC3 Jaguar was designed to provide accurate hip fire at longer distances than the Lynx. TR use only.

The Terran Republic's Heavy Carbine project resulted in the HC1 Cougar. Utilizing a higher caliber cartridge than its LC cousins, the Cougar possesses unparalleled stopping power amongst other Terran carbines up to medium range.

Based off of its bigger assault rifle brother, the smaller Pulsar C  was developed with an emphasis on stopping power. While not as easy to control, the heavy-hitting Pulsar C is far more devastating at close range. VS use only.
Vanu Esamir's weapon labs created the Solstice Burst to further extend the weapon's range with a controlled burst fire mode. VS use only.
A built-in select fire mode gives users of the Solstice SF the ability to adapt to nearly any scenario. VS use only.
The Serpent VE92's overclocked power core interface allows for an extremely high rate of fire, making it a lethal opponent in close quarters combat. VS use only.

Vanu Labs' close-to-midrange Zenith VX-5 uses advanced crystalline structures to significantly reduce weight without compromising on strength. It features both precision hipfire and increased movement speed while aiming.
Esamir Munition Corporation's EM1 LMG is a unique mix of high ammo count and fast reloading time, allowing the shooter to control firing lanes with little downtime. NC use only.

Genudine Dynamics developed the 22S as a possible replacement for the NC6 SAW. In comparison to the SAW, it features a faster firing rate and reload time, but is limited by a 50-round detachable box magazine. NC use only.
The NC6S Gauss SAW's select fire mode gives it incredible adaptability on the field. NC use only.
The EM6's incredible adaptability on the field makes it popular among NC soldiers. NC use only.

The LA1 Anchor is tuned for close quarters effectiveness. It features high damage, moderate rate of fire, advanced laser attachments, and a 50 round box magazine for quick combat reloads. NC use only.

This special, versatile variant of the CARV can adapt to nearly any situation thanks to its multiple firing modes and wide range of attachments. Compared to its predecessor, it features a slightly slower rate of fire and more controllable recoil. TR use only.
The MSW-R was designed to meet the needs of mobile Terran Republic shock troopers. Its light weight and fast reload time allows forward soldiers to push forward without stopping. TR use only.
The T16 Rhino was designed as a squad support weapon that remains accurate, even during sustained fire. TR use only.
Designed with distance and accuracy in mind, the TMG-50's manageable recoil allows it to outperform other LMGs at long range. TR use only.
Developed for a mix of close quarters combat and point defense, the T32 Bull features both balanced recoil and high maneuverability. TR use only.
Embedded recoil dampeners along the barrel of the Polaris allow it to remain accurate when firing from the hip. VS use only.

The Pulsar Light Support Weapon (LSW) is a Pulsar variant with a high capacity battery and heavier barrel. Its reputation as a highly versatile weapon makes it a popular choice for missions where anything can happen. VS use only.

The SVA-88's overclocked discharge coil allows it to fire plasma at a higher velocity than most weapons in its class. When firing at long distances, the user will need to lead targets much less than usual. VS use only.

Vanu Esamir's AdvWep labs designed the heavy-hitting Flare VE6 to pack the most punch per shot. In the hands of an experience marksman, the Flare can wreak havoc on enemy infantry at close to medium ranges. VS use only.
The Ursa features manageable recoil and a high velocity projectile, making it extremely effective at ranges beyond that of other LMGs. VS use only.

Cutting edge railgun tech found in Auraxis' Firearms Railjack sniper rifle allows for lightning-fast bullet velocities. Distant targets are dropped almost instantly following a split-second charge-up delay from its powerful superconductor.
The TRAP-M1 can switch between short-range 3-round burst and long-range 2-round burst firing modes, allowing for incredible flexibility on the battlefield.

Equipped with an experimental regenerating power core, the Phaseshift VX-S has no use for traditional ammunition, and can switch between semi-auto and bolt-action firing modes to fit the engagement range. VS use only.
The automatic AF-18 Stalker is deadly in close quarters and medium range combat. NC use only.
The automatic SOAS-20's high rate of fire makes it an excellent choice for mid-range encounters. TR use only.
The fully automatic Artemis VX26 scout rifle is capable of quickly dispatching enemy infantry at close to medium ranges. VS use only.
The versatile standard-issue NC4 Mag-Shot was the first pistol to utilize Gauss technology. This variant features a unique gold plating.  NC use only.
The LA8 Rebel's high damage gives it a longer effective range when compared to most side arms. NC use only.
The 2-round burst LA3 Desperado can quickly eliminate targets at close range. NC use only.
The NC08 Mag-Scatter's powerful tungsten buckshot and compact frame make it an excellent close-range sidearm that can quickly dispatch nearby targets.
The reliable TX1 Repeater's 3-round burst fire mode provides considerable stopping power at close range. This variant features a unique gold plating.  TR use only.
A popular sidearm amongst TR soldiers, the high-capacity TX2 Emperor has been in service for over 200 years. TR use only.
The TS2 Inquisitor features an extended magazine capable of outlasting the enemy even in the most drawn out firefights. TR use only.
The Terran Republic's Automatic Machine Pistol functions similarly to an SMG thanks to its lightning-fast, fully automatic fire.
The Beamer VS3 is the standard sidearm for the Vanu Sovereignty. Its high rate of fire allows the user to eliminate nearby targets quickly. This variant features a unique gold plating.  VS use only.
Designed as an all-purpose sidearm for VS soldiers, the Manticore SX40 is able to perform well in any situation. VS use only.
The Cerberus is able to fire overcharged rounds that are highly damaging in close range. VS use only.
Reverse-engineered from ancient Vanu tech, the Spiker makes use of a standard 2x burst, as well as an alternate firing mode which charges up an armor piercing blast.
The iconic NC12 Sweeper shotgun features a high capacity magazine as well as considerable stopping power at close range. It excels in urban combat scenarios. NC use only.
The powerful TS4 Haymaker features a large magazine, allowing for sustained fire without needing to reload. TR use only.
The Thanatos VE70's lethality in close quarters makes it a frightening opponent in urban combat scenarios. VS use only.
This hard hitting but slower firing SMG is used as an efficient personal defense weapon.  Made by Nanite Systems, the leading Auraxis firearms dealer. All factions can use NS weapons.

This hard hitting but slower firing SMG is used as an efficient personal defense weapon with a sleek black finish.  Made by Nanite Systems, the leading Auraxis firearms dealer. All factions can use NS weapons.

This hard hitting but slower firing SMG is used as an efficient personal defense weapon with a solid gold finish.  Made by Nanite Systems, the leading Auraxis firearms dealer. All factions can use NS weapons.
The AF-34 Mattock features increased effective range in comparison to the other MAX anti-infantry weapons. NC use only.
Known for its lethality in close quarters, the automatic AF-41 Hacksaw's high rate of fire gives it an advantage for point defense scenarios. NC use only.
Auraxis Firearms' first venture into MAX weaponry was the AF-23 Grinder. It features an extended ammo reserve for sustained fire. NC use only.
The M6 Onslaught was designed as a defensive alternative to the MX1, allowing for a higher rate of fire suitable for holding down important locations. TR use only.
The M2's increased ammo capacity has proven itself as a boon to small or stranded squads. TR use only.
Ironically nicknamed "Mercy," the latest iteration of the accurate Mobile Rotary Cannon can drop enemy infantry at a distance. TR use only.
The Nebula VM20's overclocked power core interface allows for a rapid rate of fire to quickly dispatch enemy infantry in close quarters. VS use only.

Created to help increase survivability for MAXes with no infantry support, the Cosmos VM3's increased ammo capacity enables lone units to defend themselves longer without access to an equipment terminal. VS use only.
The lightweight Blueshift VM5 anti-infantry MAX weapon was designed to provide increased accuracy over the standard-issue VM1. VS use only.

The NC05 Jackhammer's stopping power and sustained fire capabilities make it a frightening weapon in close quarters combat. It features a unique burst fire mode that doubles its rate of fire. NC use only.
The sound of the menacing T7 MCG firing strikes fear into the heart of its enemies. It is capable of sustained fire that can tear apart entire squads. TR use only.

The experimental Lasher X2 fires volatile orbs of plasma that explode on contact with hard surfaces. Field trials have demonstrated its effectiveness at suppressing fire, flushing out enemies and melting infantry. VS use only.

Created to help increase survivability for MAXes with no infantry support, the Cosmos VM3's increased ammo capacity enables lone units to defend themselves longer without access to an equipment terminal. VS use only.
The lightweight Blueshift VM5 anti-infantry MAX weapon was designed to provide increased accuracy over the standard-issue VM1. VS use only.
Very few weapons are able to touch the Lynx's incredible rate of fire. Featuring a cyclic rate of 909 RPM, the LC2 Lynx tears through infantry at close to medium range.
The VX6-7's fast rate of fire and lightweight construction make it an excellent weapon in close quarters combat. VS use only.

The semi-automatic Special Purpose Rifle (SPR) is a marksman rifle built on the highly-configurable Gauss platform. Developed after the start of the Auraxis War, it has remained in use due to its accuracy when making long-distance shots. NC use only.
The medium-range SAS-R's sniper rifle features a rapid bolt action that allows users to make follow up shots on targets before they can reach cover. NC use only.
The semi-automatic Impetus sniper rifle is a favorite amongst Infiltrators for covert operations. It excels at medium range due to its considerable stopping power and rate of fire. NC use only.
The high muzzle velocity of the LA80's projectiles reduces the amount that a target must be lead, making it an excellent choice for sniping targets at extreme distances. NC use only.
The bulky EM4 Longshot's overclocked propulsion coils allow for projectiles that both travel faster and hit harder in comparison to other bolt-action sniper rifles. NC use only.
The AF-6 Shadow is a semi-automatic scout rifle purpose-built for closer effective ranges than sniper rifles. NC use only.
The accurate Warden semi-automatic battle rifle is effective at stopping infantry far past the typical LMG or carbine. NC use only.
The versatile M77-B's balance of stopping power, accuracy, and rate of fire make it an excellent choice for Infiltrators that have been provided with limited information for a mission. TR use only.
Deadly in the hands of a skilled Infiltrator, the bolt action TSAR-42's features a unique bolt rotation system designed to improve the time between shots. TR use only.
The KSR-35's high-powered 7x65 cartridge is extremely effective at dropping targets at medium range. TR use only.
The powerful bolt-action SR-7 is capable of eliminating targets from extremely long distances. TR use only.
Chambered for the powerful 12.7x75mm round, the high muzzle velocity and stopping power afforded by the RAMS .50M ensures shots will hit harder and faster than others in its class. TR use only.
The accurate Heavy Scout Rifle features a higher rate of fire compared to semi-auto sniper rifles. TR use only.
The semi-automatic AMR-66 battle rifle uses powerful cartridges that hold considerable stopping power up to medium range. TR use only.
The bolt-action XM98's dialed-in power core interface draws allows for a remarkably versatile plasma sniper rifle. VS use only.
The Ghost VS12's high rate of fire provides considerable lethality at medium range due to its modified heat-shunting discharge coil. VS use only.
Recoil dampeners throughout the hefty Phantom VA23 make pulling off medium-range follow up shots effortless. VS use only.

The high velocity plasma projectiles the Vanu Sovereignty's V10 fires reduces the amount that moving targets must be lead, making it one of the easiest to use long range weapons on Auraxis. VS use only.
The powerful Parallax VX3 sniper rifle's heavy-hitting, high velocity plasma projectiles allow for easy long distance shots. VS use only.
Created for spec-ops missions where sniper rifles would prove unsuitable, the powerful semi-automatic Nyx VX31 scout rifle excels at medium range. VS use only.
The heavy-hitting Eidolon VE33 features accurate semi-automatic fire capable of dropping distant targets with ease. VS use only.
The AF-4 Cyclone is a fully automatic submachine gun that has a higher damage output than most weapons in its class. NC use only.
Equipped with a built-in extended magazine, the Blitz GD-10's increased ammo capacity enables it to put down multiple targets between reloads. NC use only.
The AF-4 Cyclone is a fully automatic submachine gun that has a higher damage output than most weapons in its class. NC use only.
The SMG-46 Armistice fully automatic submachine gun features an extremely fast rate of fire. TR use only.
Equipped with an extended magazine, the Hailstorm's generous ammo capacity has saved many soldiers who would've been caught reloading without it. TR use only.

The Eridani SX5 fully automatic submachine gun excels in close quarter combat situations. VS use only.

The powerful NC15 Phoenix uses a camera guided missile that allows the user to adjust its trajectory mid-flight. NC use only.

Genudine Dynamic's flexible Hawk rocket launcher can lock onto enemy aircraft, as well as be dumbfired against enemy armor or infantry. NC use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Flak detonation. Optional Lockon: Aircraft</font>

Equipped with an anti-armor SKEP warhead, the M9 was designed to lock-onto and destroy ground based vehicles, while retaining dumbfire capabilities for increased versatility. TR use only. <font color="#dc9c36">Optional Lockon: Armor</font>

The TRS-12 Uppercut's highly mobile platform provides great versatility and speed while engaging multiple targets. TR use only.
The TAS-16 Blackjack boasts extremely high close quarters burst damage, even for a shotgun. TR use only.

Released as a commemorative edition of the NC's wildly successful foray into electromagnetic weaponry, the NC1 Gauss Rifle, the Gauss Prime marksman assault rifle can effortlessly drop distant targets.

Special Auraxium-plated plastic explosives capable of incredible damage to both infantry, MAXes, and vehicles.

The Auraxium Mag-Cutter is only awarded to highly decorated New Conglomerate soldiers. It comes equipped with a powerful electromagnet that greatly enhances its cutting ability, allowing it to slice through heavy body armor.

Legal possession of an Auraxium Chainblade is considered a badge of honor amongst the Terran Republic.  Only the most revered TR soldiers will ever wield this powerful and highly desired miniature chainsaw.

The mark of a highly regarded soldier, the Vanu Sovereignty only offers the Auraxium Force Blade to their most capable warriors. Much like its standard-issue version, contact with the blade is incredibly damaging to human tissues.

Nanite Systems' switch-style AutoBlade was launched as a full-featured utility knife. Its oscillating motor slices through tough materials with ease, while the integrated Lumifiber strips provide enough light for cutting wires in the dark.

Simple stainless steel knives haven't gone out of style as a weapon of choice for the discerning space psycho. Despite using millenia-old technology, contemporary body armor hasn't solved the problem of 'getting stabbed.'

Originally designed as an office toy for long-range candy corn deliveries, Nanite Systems' Indar office branch quickly went out of business after the public experienced firsthand the folly of firing the world's hardest substance out of a 'toy' gun.
For the dedicated knife-wielding psycho, access to the hypnotically-shifting Auraxium Slasher is mysteriously granted after demonstrating a disturbing devotion to their craft.

The opulent NS-11CG is a variant of the 11C, a carbine well known for its stability and all-around performance. The 11CG is also known for all that, as well as looking good. All factions can use NS weapons.

The gold finish on the NS-15MG has cemented it as a status symbol among soldiers on Auraxis. Good looks aside, the 15MG is an accurate all-arounder that performs well in many combat situations. All factions can use NS weapons.

Created with a black metal finish, the imposing NS-15MB has accurate, stable fire at even long distances and reloads quickly. Its reputation as an all-arounder has made it a popular Heavy Assault choice. All factions can use NS weapons.

This weaponized pumpkin packs a punch. Killing space pumpkins will refill your stock of pumpkin grenades. These grenades are only available during the holiday season.
Generates a dense mesh of nanites around the soldier that decays slowly while active, and absorbs up to 450 damage before failing. Regenerates to full in 31 seconds.
Originally reserved for members of Nomad, the Gladius is the hardest hitting SMG ever designed. NC use only.
The adaptable Jackal SMG has high stopping power in close quarters while remaining easy to control. TR use only.
Advances in plasma manipulation technology have resulted in the VE-S Canis, a compact, close range weapon with a firing rate that increases over time. VS use only.
Reminescent of old-world deringer designs, this modified Underboss fires two rounds at once.

Designed with mobility in mind, the lightweight alloys that make up Auraxis Firearm's AF-A4 Bandit allows for faster movement while aiming without compromising on stopping power in close to medium ranges.

Vanu Labs' close-to-midrange Zenith VX-5 uses advanced crystalline structures to significantly reduce weight without compromising on strength. It features both precision hipfire and increased movement speed while aiming.
Very few weapons are able to touch the Lynx's incredible rate of fire. Featuring a cyclic rate of 909 RPM, the LC2 Lynx tears through infantry at close to medium range.
The automatic AF-18 Stalker is deadly in close quarters and medium range combat. NC use only.

Advanced cooling techniques provide the Maw LMG with a decisive mix of reload speed and stopping power, offering flexibility in many combat scenarios. VS use only.
Equipped with a state of the art cooling jacket, the Watchman LMG boasts the highest rate of fire of any weapon in its class. TR use only.

The experimental Lasher X2 fires volatile orbs of plasma that explode on contact with hard surfaces. Field trials have demonstrated its effectiveness at suppressing fire, flushing out enemies and melting infantry. VS use only.
The sound of the menacing T7 MCG firing strikes fear into the heart of its enemies. It is capable of sustained fire that can tear apart entire squads. TR use only.

The NC05 Jackhammer's stopping power and sustained fire capabilities make it a frightening weapon in close quarters combat. It features a unique burst fire mode that doubles its rate of fire. NC use only.
The Naginata light machine gun can maintain rounds on medium ranged targets without releasing the trigger, but quickly loses that benefit while moving. All factions can use NS weapons.

description.de: Der Flash ist ein Quad, das den Fahrer und einen Passagier schnell an die Front zu bringt. Der Passagier ist in der Lage, das meiste seiner Ausrstung zu benutzen, whrend er auf dem Rcksitz mitfhrt.
description.en: The Flash is an ATV capable of getting the driver and one passenger quickly to the front lines.  The passenger is able to use most of their personal equipment while riding on the back.
description.es: El Flash es un ATV capaz de llevar al conductor y aun soldado ms a las lneas del frente rpidamente. El pasajero puede usar la mayora de su equipo personal desde la parte trasera del vehculo en la que se sienta.
description.fr: Le Flash est un Quad pouvant transporter son conducteur et un passager au front rapidement. Le passager peut utiliser la plupart de son quipement personnel lorsqu'il est install  l'arrire.
description.it: Il Flash  un Atv che consente al conducente e al passeggero di arrivare velocemente al fronte. Il passeggero pu utilizzare la maggior parte dell'equipaggiamento personale mentre viaggia nel retro del veicolo.
description.tr: imek, srcy ve bir yolcuyu cephe hattna abuk ulatrabilen bir ATV aracdr. Yolcu arkada otururken kiisel ekipmanlarndan ounu kullanabilir.

description.de: Ein Sunderer ist ein groer Transporter mit Platz fr bis zu 12 Personen. Er kann auch mit einigen anderen Untersttzungsfunktionen wie beispielsweise einer transportablen Respawnstation, Fahrzeugreparatur oder Munitionsversorgung der Fahrzeuge ausgestattet werden.
description.en: The Sunderer is a large transport capable of holding 12 soldiers.  It can also be outfitted with several support functions such as a mobile respawn station, vehicle repair or vehicle ammo resupply.
description.es: El Sunderer es un transporte de gran capacidad que puede llevar hasta 12 soldados. Tambin se le pueden otorgar funciones de apoyo como estacin mvil de apariciones, punto de reparacin de vehculos o punto de suministro de vehculos.
description.fr: Le Disperseur est un gros vhicule capable de transporter 12 soldats. Il peut aussi tre quip de plusieurs fonctions de soutien telles qu'une station de ranimation mobile, un vhicule de rparation ou un vhicule de rapprovisionnement en munitions.
description.it: Il Sunderer  un grosso trasporto truppe capace di portare fino a 12 soldati. Pu anche venire equipaggiato per avere funzioni di supporto come stazione mobile di rigenerazione, di riparazione veicoli o di fornitura di munizioni per veicoli.
description.tr: Yarc, 12 asker tayabilme zelliine sahip byk bir asker nakil aracdr. Ayn zamanda gezici bir ekipman terminali, ara tamiri ya da ara mhimmat ikmali gibi farkl ilevlere de sahiptir.

description.de: Der Lightning ist ein leichter Ein-Mann-Panzer. Er kann mit verschiedenen Geschtzarten ausgestattet werden, um zur Flugabwehr oder zur Panzerabwehr eingesetzt zu werden.
description.en: The Lightning is a light one man tank.  The Lightning can be outfitted with various types of turrets allowing it to fill anti-air and anti-armor roles.
description.es: El Lightning es un tanque monoplaza ligero al que se le pueden instalar varios tipos de torretas que lo hacen efectivo contra vehculos areos y blindados.
description.fr: Le Foudre est un char lger monoplace. Le Foudre peut tre quip de diffrentes tourelles lui permettant de remplir des rles anti-ariens et antichars.
description.it: Il Lightning  un carro leggero monoposto. Il Lightning pu essere equipaggiato con vari tipi di torrette che gli permettono di avere ruoli antiaerei e anche anticarro.
description.tr: Yldrm, hafif bir tek kiilik tanktr. Yldrm, uak-savar ve zrh-savar rollerinde kullanlmak zere farkl tip taretler ile donatlabilinir.

description.de: Der Magrider ist ein Luftkissenpanzer, der ausschlielich von der Vanu-Souvernitt genutzt wird. Mit seinen Schwebeeigenschaften kann er weitaus mehr Gelndearten als andere Panzer bezwingen.
description.en: The Magrider is a hover tank used exclusively by the Vanu Sovereignty.  Its hover capabilities allow it ability strafe and climb more types of terrain beyond other tanks.
description.es: El Magrider es un tanque aerodeslizador exclusivo de la Soberana Vanu. Sus capacidades para sostenerse en el aire le permiten realizar desplazamientos laterales y trepar por todo tipo de terrenos inalcanzables para otros tanques.
description.fr: L'Arochar est un char planeur utilis exclusivement par la Souverainet Vanu. Ses capacits de vol stationnaire lui permettent de se dplacer latralement et d'arpenter davantage de types de terrains que les autres chars.
description.it: Il Magrider  il carro armato aeroscivolante della Sovranit Vanu. La sua capacit di librarsi gli consente di spostarsi lateralmente e di arrampicarsi su una variet di terreni, in modo superiore agli altri carri.
description.tr: Svari, sadece Vanu Hkmdarl'nda mevcut olan orta snf bir tanktr. Svari, havada durma zellikleri sayesinde yanlara dn kabiliyetine ve farkl tip arazilerde dier tanklara gre daha fazla trmanma zelliine sahiptir.

description.de: Der Vanguard ist ein robuster Panzer, der ausschlielich vom Neuen Konglomerat genutzt wird. Der Vanguard bevorzugt schwerere Frontpanzerung als andere Fahrzeuge seiner Klasse, aber das geht auch auf Kosten der Geschwindigkeit.
description.en: The Vanguard is a sturdy tank used exclusively by the New Conglomerate.  The vanguard favors heavier front armor compared to other tanks, but this comes at the cost of speed.
description.es: El Vanguard es un tanque robusto exclusivo del Nuevo Conglomerado. Comparado con otros tanques, el Vanguard dispone de un blindaje delantero ms pesado, pero eso implica una reduccin de velocidad.
description.fr: L'claireur est un char solide utilis exclusivement par le Nouveau Conglomrat. L'claireur est dot d'un blindage frontal plus lourd compar  d'autres chars, mais c'est au dtriment de la rapidit.
description.it: Il Vanguard  il carro armato pesante usato esclusivamente dal Nuovo Conglomerato. Il Vanguard  dotato di un'armatura frontale pi pesante rispetto agli altri carri ed  per questo meno veloce.
description.tr: nc, sadece Yeni Birleim'de mevcut olan orta snf bir tanktr. nc, dier tanklara kyasla n taraf daha ar bir zrha sahiptir ama bu zellik hzndan feragat ettirmektedir.

description.de: Der Prowler ist ein beweglicher Panzer, der ausschlielich von der Terranischen Republik genutzt wird. Er glnzt mit enormer Hchstgeschwindigkeit und seine Zwillingskanonen knnen noch schneller Schaden verursachen.
description.en: The Prowler is a versatile tank used exclusively by the Terran Republic.  It boasts a higher top speed and its twin barrel cannons are capable of inflicting damage quicker than the other tanks.
description.es: El Prowler es un verstil tanque exclusivo de la Repblica Terran. Cuenta con una velocidad mxima superior y sus caones dobles hacen que pueda infligir dao mucho ms deprisa que otros tanques.
description.fr: Le Prdateur est un char polyvalent utilis exclusivement par la Rpublique Terrane. Il s'enorgueillit d'une vitesse maximale plus leve et de canons jumeaux pouvant infliger des dgts plus rapidement que les autres chars.
description.it: Il Prowler  un carro armato versatile usato esclusivamente dalla Repubblica Terrestre. Ha una velocit massima molto alta ed  dotato di cannoni gemelli che possono infliggere danni pi rapidamente rispetto a quelli degli altri carri.
description.tr: Sinsi, sadece Terran Cumhuriyeti'nde mevcut olan orta snf bir tanktr. Yksek hzlara abuk kabilir ve ikiz toplar ile dier tanklara gre daha ar hasat verme kabiliyetine sahiptir.

description.de: Der Scythe ist ein durch eine Person bemanntes Jagdflugzeug, das ausschlielich von der Vanu-Souvernitt eingesetzt wird. Dank der Technologie der Vanu kann der Scythe stabiler schweben und sein Tempo drosseln.
description.en: The Scythe is a one man air superiority fighter in use exclusively by the Vanu Sovereignty.  Vanu technology allows the Scythe to be a more stable aircraft when hovering and decelerating.
description.es: El Scythe es un caza monoplaza de superioridad area exclusivo de la Soberana Vanu. La tecnologa de Vanu permite que el Scythe sea una aeronave ms estable a la hora de sostenerse en el aire y disminuir la velocidad.
description.fr: La Faucheuse est un aronef suprieur monoplace utilis exclusivement par la Souverainet Vanu. La technologie Vanu permet  la Faucheuse d'tre un aronef plus stable lors du vol stationnaire ou de la dclration.
description.it: Lo Scythe  un caccia monoposto di superiorit aerea usato esclusivamente dalla Sovranit Vanu. La tecnologia Vanu ha dotato lo Scythe di una maggiore stabilit quando rimane sospeso in aria e perde velocit.
description.tr: Trpan, sadece Vanu Hkmdarl'nda mevcut olan tek kii tarafndan kullanlan bir hava stnl uadr. Vanu teknolojisi, Trpan'n havada kalrken ve alalrken daha dengeli olmasn salar.

description.de: Der Reaver ist ein durch eine Person bemanntes Jagdflugzeug, das ausschlielich vom Neuen Konglomerat eingesetzt wird. Seine leistungsstarken Motoren, kombiniert mit der groen Nachbrennkapazitt, machen dieses Flugzeug zu dem schnellsten imperiumsspezifischen Jagdflieger am Himmel.
description.en: The Reaver is a one man air superiority fighter in use exclusively by the New Conglomerate.  Its powerful engines combined with its great afterburner capacity make this aircraft the fastest empire specific fighter in the skies.
description.es: El Reaver es un caza monoplaza de superioridad area exclusivo del Nuevo Conglomerado. Sus grandes motores junto con su gran capacidad de postcombustin hacen que este sea el caza ms rpido especfico de un imperio.
description.fr: Le Ravageur est un appareil arien suprieur monoplace utilis exclusivement par le Nouveau Conglomrat. Ses moteurs puissants allis  sa superbe capacit de postcombustion font de cet aronef spcifique  son empire le plus rapide du ciel.
description.it: Il Reaver  un caccia monoposto di superiorit aerea usato esclusivamente dal Nuovo Conglomerato. I suoi potenti motori combinati a un postbruciatore capace gli consentono di raggiungere la pi alta velocit tra i caccia di tutti gli imperi.
description.tr: Yamac, yalnzca Yeni Birleim tarafndan kullanlan kiisel hava stnlne sahip bir hava aracdr. Byk motorlarndaki Afterburner kapasitesinin gl motorlarla birlemesi sayesinde bu uak, imparatorluun en iyi dal hzna ulaan hava aracdr.

description.de: Der Mosquito ist ein durch eine Person bemanntes Jagdflugzeug, das ausschlielich von der Terranischen Republik eingesetzt wird. Durch jahrzehntelange Optimierung, ist dieses imperiumsspezifische Flugzeug nun das schnellste und beweglichste seiner Art.
description.en: The Mosquito is a one man air superiority fighter in use exclusively by the Terran Republic.  Decades of refinement have made this aircraft the quickest and most agile of all the empire-specific aircrafts.
description.es: El Mosquito es un caza monoplaza de superioridad area exclusivo de la Repblica Terran. Aos de refinamiento han llevado a esta aeronave a ser la ms rpida y gil de todas las naves especficas de un imperio.
description.fr: Le Mosquito est un aronef suprieur monoplace utilis exclusivement par la Rpublique Terrane. Des dcennies de raffinement ont fait du Mosquito l'aronef le plus rapide et le plus agile de tous les aronefs spcifiques  leur empire.
description.it: Il Mosquito  un caccia monoposto di superiorit aerea usato esclusivamente dalla Repubblica Terrestre. Decenni di perfezionamento ne hanno fatto il velivolo pi agile di tutti i velivoli degli imperi.
description.tr: Sivrisinek, yalnzca Terran Cumhuriyeti tarafndan kullanlan, kiisel hava stnlne sahip bir hava aracdr. Yllarca sren gelitirmeler sayesinde bu uak, imparatorluk hava aralar arasndaki en hzl ve en evik hava arac olmutur.

description.de: Der Liberator ist ein Drei-Mann-Kampfflugzeug. Das Artelleriegeschtz ist extrem wirksam gegen Bodenziele und er verfgt ebenso ber ein Heckgeschtz, um gegnerische Jger abzuwehren.
description.en: The Liberator is a three man gun ship.  The bombardier weapon is very powerful against ground targets and it has a tail gun to ward off enemy fighters.
description.es: El Liberator es una nave de asalto de tres plazas. Su arma bombardera es muy potente contra objetivos terrestres y tiene un puesto de artillero de cola para defenderse de los cazas enemigos.
description.fr: Le Librateur est un appareil de combat servi par 3 hommes d'quipage. Son bombardier est trs puissant contre les cibles au sol et il possde un canonnier arrire pour repousser les combattants ennemis.
description.it: Il Liberator  una cannoniera volante con tre uomini di equipaggio. L'armamento di bordo  molto potente contro i bersagli a terra e possiede anche un cannone sulla coda per tenere lontani i caccia nemici.
description.tr: Kurtarc,  kiilik bir sava helikopteridir. Bombardman silah yer hedeflerine kar ok gldr ve kuyruk silah dman savalarn parampara eder.

description.de: Der Galaxy ist ein Lufttransporter, der bis zu elf Soldaten schnell in eine Basis bringen kann. Er enthlt vier Waffenaufstze, die zur Verteidigung oder zur Ausstattung in einer Kampfflugzeugrolle verwendet werden knnen.
description.en: The Galaxy is an air transport that can be used to hot drop up to 11 soldiers.  It has four weapon mounts that can be used for defense or outfitted into a gunship role.
description.es: El Galaxy sirve como trasporte areo y puede desembarcar hasta 11 soldados. Tiene cuatro puntos de fijacin de armas que pueden ser utilizados como defensa o para transformarlo en una nave de guerra.
description.fr: Le Galaxie est un transport arien qui peut tre utilis pour larguer directement jusqu' 11 soldats. Il a quatre supports d'armes qui peuvent tre utiliss pour la dfense ou quips pour remplir le rle de canonnier.
description.it: Il Galaxy  un aereo da trasporto che pu essere usato per paracadutare fino a 11 soldati. Pu montare fino a quattro armi per difesa o le pu equipaggiare come cannoniera.
description.tr: Galaksi, 11 askeri tayabilen bir hava nakil aracdr. Savunma amacyla ya da saldr arac olarak kullanlabilen drt silah yuvasna sahiptir.

description.de: Der Harasser ist ein weniger Wagen fr drei Personen, der fr alle Imperien zugnglich ist. Der Fahrer und der Schtze sitzen beide im inneren des Cockpits whrend der dritte Passagier hinten auf dem Wagen steht und Zugriff auf seine eigenen Waffen hat.
description.en: The Harasser is an agile 3 man buggy that is available to all empires.  The driver and gunner are both seated inside the cockpit; while the third passenger stands on the rear of the buggy and has access to his own weapons.
description.es: El Harasser es un vehculo de 3 plazas que est disponible para todos los imperios. El conductor y el artillero se sientan en la cabina mientras que el tercer pasajero va de pie en la parte trasera del vehculo y tiene acceso a sus propias armas.
description.fr: L'Offenseur est un buggy  trois places disponible pour tous les empires. Le conducteur et le canonnier sont tous deux assis  l'intrieur du cockpit tandis que le troisime passager est debout  l'arrire du buggy et a accs  ses propres armes.
description.it: L'Harrasser  un agile veicolo per tre passeggeri disponibile a tutti gli imperi. Il conducente e l'artigliere sono entrambi seduti nell'abitacolo, mentre il terzo passeggero sta in piedi nella parte posteriore del veicolo e pu accedere alle sue armi.
description.tr: Tacizci, tm imparatorluklarn kullanabilecei  kiilik bir buggy aracdr. Src ve nianc kokpitin iinde oturur; nc yolcu ise buggy aracnn arkasndadr ve kendi silahlarn kullanabilir.

description.de: Vom Orbit aus freigesetzt, werden die Transportkapseln dazu benutzt, Truppen schnell auf einem Schlachtfeld einzusetzen. Die Soldaten darin knnen die Richtung der Kapsel ein wenig steuern und sie in einigen Fllen als effektive Waffe gegen diejenigen benutzen, auf der die Kapsel landet.
description.en: Released from orbit, Drop Pods are used to rapidly deploy troops to a battlefield.  Soldiers in the drop pod have some control on the pod's direction and in some cases can use it as an effective weapon, damaging those it lands on.
description.es: Las cpsulas de aterrizaje se lanzan desde la rbita y se utilizan para desplegar tropas en el campo de batalla. Los soldados tienen cierto control sobre la direccin que toman las cpsulas y en algunos casos, las pueden utilizar como armas que daan a aquellos sobre los que aterrizan.
description.fr: Librs de leur orbite, les modules de dploiement sont utiliss pour dployer rapidement des soldats sur le champ de bataille. Les soldats  l'intrieur du module ont un certain contrle sur sa direction et peuvent parfois l'utiliser comme une arme efficace, infligeant des dgts l o il atterrit.
description.it: Le capsule di sbarco sono usate per schierare rapidamente le truppe sul campo di battaglia. I soldati che si trovano nella capsula hanno una minima possibilit di controllare la direzione in cui si muovono e talvolta possono trasformare la capsula stessa in un'arma efficace, causando danni nell'impatto.
description.tr: Yrngeden gelen ni Kapslleri, askerleri bir sava alanna hemen indirmek iin kullanlr. ni kapslndeki askerler, kapsl ynn kontrol edebilir ve duruma gre etkili bir silah gibi kullanarak ini yerinde bulunanlara hasar verebilirler.

description.de: Die Valkyrie ist ein 6-Personen-Flugzeug, das fr die nahe Luftuntersttzung und den Transport geeignet sind. Es wird von einem Piloten und einem Frontschtzen geflogen und hat vier Pltze fr Passagiere, die ihre private Ausrstung whrend des Fluges benutzen knnen.
description.en: The Valkyrie is a six person aircraft used for close air support and transportation. It is crewed by a pilot and a forward gunner with room for four passengers that are able to use their personal equipment while in flight.
description.es: El Valkyrie es una aeronave para seis personas que se utiliza como apoyo areo de corto alcance y como medio de transporte. Su tripulacin consta de un piloto y un artillero frontal, con espacio para cuatro pasajeros que pueden usar su propio armamento durante el vuelo.
description.fr: Le Valkyrie est un aronef transportant 6 personnes, il est utilis en tant que support arien rapproch ainsi que pour le transport. Son quipage est compos d'un pilote, d'un canonnier avant et il contient de la place pour quatre passagers pouvant utiliser leur quipement en vol.
description.it: Il Valkyrie  un aereo a sei posti usato per il supporto e il trasporto sulle corte distanze.  equipaggiato con un pilota e un artigliere frontale e ha posto per quattro passeggeri che possono usare la loro attrezzatura mentre sono in volo.
description.tr: Valkyrie Vehicle Description

description.en: ANT Prototype Description

description.de: Der Phalanxgeschtz "Xiphos" zur Personenabwehr schiet 20mm Geschosse mit seinen Zwillings-Gatling-Kanonen, die Schaden bei Infanterie und leichter Panzerung anrichten.
description.en: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Turret sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.
description.es: La Torreta Phalanx Xiphos antipersonas dispara municin de 20 mm de sus dos caones giratorios para despedazar a la infantera y los blindados ligeros.
description.fr: La tourelle phalange antipersonnel Xiphos mitraille des cartouches de 20mm avec ses canons rotatifs jumeaux, efficaces contre l'infanterie et les blindages lgers.
description.it: La torretta antiuomo Phalanx Xiphos spara proiettili di 20mm con due mitragliatrici a canne rotanti che danneggiano fanteria e corazze leggere.
description.tr: Xiphos Falanks Tareti, piyade ldrmekte olduka etkili iki adet yksek isabet oranna sahip mitralyz ile donatlmtr.

description.de: Das MANA-Geschtz(Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) wird von Ingenieuren eingesetzt und ist gegen leicht und mittelschwer gepanzerte Ziele effektiv.
description.en: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Personnel turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against soft and medium armored targets.
description.es: La torreta antipersonal MANA (pilotada neutralizadora de agresores en asaltos) es usada por ingenieros y es eficaz contra objetivos con blindaje ligero y medio.
description.fr: La tourelle antipersonnel ANAH (Assaut Neutralisant Agresseurs Habits) est dploye par les Ingnieurs et est efficace contre les cibles au blindage faible et moyen.
description.it: La torretta d'assalto antiuomo manuale neutralizza-aggressore MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) viene dispiegata dai genieri ed  efficace contro i bersagli morbidi o mediamente corazzati.
description.tr: MANA (nsanl Saldrgan Etkisizletirme Taarruzu) anti-personel tareti, mhendisler tarafndan mevzilendirilir ve hafif ve orta dereceli zrhl hedeflere kar etkilidir.

description.de: Das MANA-Geschtz (beMannter Aggressor Neutralisierungs Angriff) wird von Ingenieuren eingesetzt und ist wirksam gegen groe, gepanzerte Ziele.
description.en: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Vehicle turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against large armored targets.
description.es: MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) Anti-Vehicle turret is deployed by engineers and is effective against large armored targets.
description.fr: La tourelle anti-vhicules ANAH (Assaut Neutralisant Agresseurs Habits) est dploye par les Ingnieurs et est efficace contre les cibles blindes de grande taille.
description.it: La torretta d'assalto antiuomo manuale neutralizza-aggressore MANA (Manned Aggressor Neutralizing Assault) viene dispiegata dai genieri ed  efficace contro i grandi bersagli corazzati.
description.tr: SET (nsanl Saldrgan Etkisizletirme Taarruzu) Ara-Savar tareti mhendisleri tarafndan kurulur ve geni zrhl hedeflere kar etkilidir.

description.de: Die automatischen Spitfire-Geschtze werden von Ingenieuren platziert und greifen feindliche Infanterie innerhalb von 50 Metern automatisch an.
description.en: Spitfire Auto-Turrets are placed by engineers and automatically engage hostile infantry within 50 meters.
description.es: Las torretas automticas Spitfire las colocan los ingenieros y entablan combate automticamente con la infantera enemiga a un alcance de 50 metros.
description.fr: Les tourelles automatiques Spitfire sont places par les Ingnieurs et attaquent automatiquement l'infanterie hostile prsente dans les 50 mtres.
description.it: Le torrette automatiche Spitfire vengono posizionate dai genieri ed entrano automaticamente in contatto con la fanteria nemica nel raggio di 50 metri.

description.de: Die automatischen Spitfire-Geschtze werden von Ingenieuren platziert und greifen feindliche Infanterie innerhalb von 50 Metern automatisch an.
description.en: Spitfire Auto-Turrets are placed by engineers and automatically engage hostile infantry within 50 meters.
description.es: Las torretas automticas Spitfire las colocan los ingenieros y entablan combate automticamente con la infantera enemiga a un alcance de 50 metros.
description.fr: Les tourelles automatiques Spitfire sont places par les Ingnieurs et attaquent automatiquement l'infanterie hostile prsente dans les 50 mtres.
description.it: Le torrette automatiche Spitfire vengono posizionate dai genieri ed entrano automaticamente in contatto con la fanteria nemica nel raggio di 50 metri.

description.de: Die automatischen Spitfire-Geschtze werden von Ingenieuren platziert und greifen feindliche Infanterie innerhalb von 50 Metern automatisch an.
description.en: Spitfire Auto-Turrets are placed by engineers and automatically engage hostile infantry within 50 meters.
description.es: Las torretas automticas Spitfire las colocan los ingenieros y entablan combate automticamente con la infantera enemiga a un alcance de 50 metros.
description.fr: Les tourelles automatiques Spitfire sont places par les Ingnieurs et attaquent automatiquement l'infanterie hostile prsente dans les 50 mtres.
description.it: Le torrette automatiche Spitfire vengono posizionate dai genieri ed entrano automaticamente in contatto con la fanteria nemica nel raggio di 50 metri.

description.de: Das Aspis-Phalanxgeschtz feuert 20mm Projektile in den Himmel, welche dann in der Nhe der Flugzeuge explodieren.
description.en: The Aspis Phalanx Turret rapidly fires 20mm shells that create a burst of flak when within proximity of hostile aircraft.
description.es: La torreta Phalanx Aspis lanza al cielo proyectiles explosivos de 20 mm que explotan cuando estn cerca del radio de una aeronave.
description.fr: La tourelle phalange Aspis tire rapidement des cartouches de 20mm qui crent des explosions de DCA  proximit d'aronefs ennemis.
description.it: La torretta Phalanx Aspis lancia rapidamente in aria proiettili esplosivi di 20mm che creano una raffica di flak quando si trovano nelle vicinanze di un aereo nemico.
description.tr: Aspis Falanks Tareti, uan yaknlarnda patlayan 20mm patlayc fiekleri gkyzne ateler.

description.de: Das Fahrzeugabwehr-Phalanxgeschtz "Spear" ist in der Lage, 120mm-PB-Panzermunition mit groer Geschwindigkeit abzufeuern, was Schaden an schwer gepanzerten Zielen verursacht.
description.en: The Spear Anti-Vehicle Phalanx Turret is capable of rapidly firing 120mm AP tank rounds capable of damaging heavily armored targets.
description.es: La torreta Phalanx Spear dispara rpidamente proyectiles perforantes antitanque de 120 mm capaces de daar gravemente a los objetivos blindados.
description.fr: La tourelle phalange anti-vhicules Spear est capable de tirer rapidement des salves anti-blindage de 120mm qui infligent de gros dgts aux cibles lourdement blindes.
description.it: La torretta anticarro Phalanx Spear spara velocemente proiettili perforanti anticarro AP da 120mm in grado infliggere gravi danni agli obiettivi pesantemente corazzati.
description.tr: Mzrak Falanks Tareti, ar zrhl hedeflere hasar verebilecek 120mm AP tank mermilerini seri ekilde ateleyebilir.

description.de: Das eingesetzte Phalanxgeschtz "Spear" ist nicht verfgbar bis das Platzierungssystem vollstndig ist.
description.en: Deployed Spear Phalanx Turret will not be available until the new placement system is complete
description.es: La Torreta Phalanx Spear desplegable no estar disponible hasta completar el nuevo sistema de emplazamiento
description.fr: La tourelle phalange Spear dploye ne sera disponible qu'une fois le nouveau systme de placement termin
description.it: La torretta Phalanx Spear dispiegata non sar disponibile fino a che il nuovo sistema di posizionamento non sar completo

description.de: Der Phalanxturm "Aspis" feuert Hochgeschwindigkeitsgeschosse zur Flugabwehr ab, die besonders bei leicht gepanzerten Zielen als effektiv erweisen.
description.en: The Aspis Phalanx Tower rapidly fires high velocity anti-aircraft rounds that are effective against lightly armored targets.
description.es: La Torre Phalanx Aspis dispara proyectiles antiareos eficaces contra objetivos poco blindados a gran velocidad.
description.fr: La tour phalange Aspis tire rapidement des projectiles anti-ariens  grande vitesse efficaces contre les cibles lgrement blindes.
description.it: La torre Phalanx Aspis spara rapidamente proiettili antiaerei ad alta velocit, efficaci contro gli obiettivi leggermente corazzati.

description.de: Der Phalanxturm "Xiphos" zur Personenabwehr schiet 20mm Geschosse mit seinen Zwillings-Gatling-Kanonen, die Schaden bei Infanterie und leichter Panzerung anrichten.
description.en: The Xiphos Anti-Personnel Phalanx Tower sprays 20mm rounds with its twin rotary guns that are damaging to infantry and light armor.
description.es: La Torre Phalanx Xiphos antipersonas dispara municin de 20 mm de sus dos caones giratorios para despedazar a la infantera y los blindados ligeros.
description.fr: La tour phalange antipersonnel Xiphos mitraille des cartouches de 20mm avec ses canons rotatifs jumeaux efficaces contre l'infanterie et les blindages lgers
description.it: La torre antiuomo Phalanx Xiphos spara proiettili di 20mm con due mitragliatrici a canne rotanti che danneggiano fanteria e corazze leggere.

description.de: Die Ionenpartikel-Kanone Glaive ist ein unbemanntes Geschtz fr mittelgroe Distanzen, das Verteidigungsschildsysteme unterbricht, jedoch, augrund seines Mangels an konventioneller Ladung, nur geringen Schaden an Personen und Ausrstung anrichtet. Die IPK erfordert AI-Moduluntersttzung sowie manuell abgefeuerte Zielpfeile, um ein Ziel zu erfassen.
description.en: The Glaive Ionized Particle Cannon is unmanned mid-range artillery that disrupts defensive shield systems but only inflicts minor damage to personnel and equipment due to its lack of conventional payload. The IPC requires AI module support as well as a manually fired targeting dart to acquire a target.
description.es: El can de partculas ionizado Guja es una artillera de medio alcance no tripulada que interfiere en los sistemas de escudos defensivos pero que solo inflinge daos leves al personal y al equipo debido a su falta de carga convencional. El CPI requiere tanto un mdulo de IA como un dardo de adquisicin de objetivos disparado manualmente.
description.fr: Le Canon  Particules Ionises "Glaive" est une pice d'artillerie sans pilote de porte moyenne qui perturbe les systmes de boucliers dfensifs mais n'inflige que des dgts mineurs au personnel et  l'quipement en raison de sa faible charge conventionnelle. Le CPI ncessite un module IA ainsi qu'une flchette de guidage tire manuellement pour identifier une cible.
description.it: Il cannone a particelle ionizzate Glaive   un pezzo di artiglieria di medio raggio non pilotato che blocca gli scudi difensivi ma infligge solo danni minori alle persone e alle attrezzature perch non ha la carica esplosiva tradizionale.  L'IPC richiede un supporto modulare d IA e anche un dardo lanciato manualmente per acquisire un bersaglio.

description.de: Eine ferngesteuerte Luftdrohne, die zur Auffindung von feindlichen Truppen benutzt werden.
description.en: A remote control aerial drone that can be used to spot enemy forces.
description.es: Un VANT teledirigido que puede usarse para detectar fuerzas enemigas.
description.fr: Un drone arien tlguid pouvant tre utilis pour localiser les forces ennemies.
description.it: Un drone a pilotaggio remoto che pu essere usato per rilevare le forze nemiche.
description.tr: A remote control aerial drone that can be used to spot enemy forces.

description.de: Der Flash ist ein Quad, das den Fahrer und einen Passagier schnell an die Front zu bringt. Der Passagier ist in der Lage, das meiste seiner Ausrstung zu benutzen, whrend er auf dem Rcksitz mitfhrt.
description.en: The Flash is an ATV capable of getting the driver and one passenger quickly to the front lines.  The passenger is able to use most of their personal equipment while riding on the back.
description.es: El Flash es un ATV capaz de llevar al conductor y aun soldado ms a las lneas del frente rpidamente. El pasajero puede usar la mayora de su equipo personal desde la parte trasera del vehculo en la que se sienta.
description.fr: Le Flash est un Quad pouvant transporter son conducteur et un passager au front rapidement. Le passager peut utiliser la plupart de son quipement personnel lorsqu'il est install  l'arrire.
description.it: Il Flash  un Atv che consente al conducente e al passeggero di arrivare velocemente al fronte. Il passeggero pu utilizzare la maggior parte dell'equipaggiamento personale mentre viaggia nel retro del veicolo.
description.tr: imek, srcy ve bir yolcuyu cephe hattna abuk ulatrabilen bir ATV aracdr. Yolcu arkada otururken kiisel ekipmanlarndan ounu kullanabilir.

description.de: Die Ionenpartikel-Kanone Glaive ist ein unbemanntes Geschtz fr mittelgroe Distanzen, das Verteidigungsschildsysteme unterbricht, jedoch, augrund seines Mangels an konventioneller Ladung, nur geringen Schaden an Personen und Ausrstung anrichtet. Die IPK erfordert AI-Moduluntersttzung sowie manuell abgefeuerte Zielpfeile, um ein Ziel zu erfassen.
description.en: The Glaive Ionized Particle Cannon is unmanned mid-range artillery that disrupts defensive shield systems but only inflicts minor damage to personnel and equipment due to its lack of conventional payload. The IPC requires AI module support as well as a manually fired targeting dart to acquire a target.
description.es: El can de partculas ionizado Guja es una artillera de medio alcance no tripulada que interfiere en los sistemas de escudos defensivos pero que solo inflinge daos leves al personal y al equipo debido a su falta de carga convencional. El CPI requiere tanto un mdulo de IA como un dardo de adquisicin de objetivos disparado manualmente.
description.fr: Le Canon  Particules Ionises "Glaive" est une pice d'artillerie sans pilote de porte moyenne qui perturbe les systmes de boucliers dfensifs mais n'inflige que des dgts mineurs au personnel et  l'quipement en raison de sa faible charge conventionnelle. Le CPI ncessite un module IA ainsi qu'une flchette de guidage tire manuellement pour identifier une cible.
description.it: Il cannone a particelle ionizzate Glaive   un pezzo di artiglieria di medio raggio non pilotato che blocca gli scudi difensivi ma infligge solo danni minori alle persone e alle attrezzature perch non ha la carica esplosiva tradizionale.  L'IPC richiede un supporto modulare d IA e anche un dardo lanciato manualmente per acquisire un bersaglio.

description.de: Der ausgedrrte Kontinent von Indar beheimatet mehrere Biome, die jeweils einzigartige Herausforderungen fr ihre Kombattanten bieten.
description.en: The arid continent of Indar is home to multiple biomes, providing unique challenges for its combatants.
description.es: El rido continente de Indar alberga una diversidad de biomas que suponen todo un reto para los soldados.
description.fr: Le continent aride d'Indar regroupe un assortiment de biomes, proposant des dfis uniques  ses combattants.
description.it: L'arido continente Indar ospita una variet di biomi e mette a disposizione dei soldati sfide davvero uniche.
description.tr: Kurak Indar ktas ok eitli bir corafyaya sahiptir. Otlu ovalar, kayalk kanyonlar ve deniz yatann geni dzlkleri askerler iin farkl zorluklar da beraberinde getirir.

description.de: Hossins dichte Mangroven- und Weidenwlder bieten Schutz vor Luftangriffen zwischen ihren vielen Smpfen und Hochlndern.
description.en: Hossin's dense mangrove and willow forests provide air cover along its many swamps and highlands.
description.es: El denso mangle y los bosques de sauce de Hossin proporcionan una proteccin area a lo largo de sus muchos pantanos y altiplanicies.
description.fr: La dense mangrove et les forts de saule de Hossin offrent une couverture arienne le long de ses nombreux marcages et montagnes.
description.it: Le fitte foreste di mangrovie e di salici a Hossin forniscono copertura aerea lungo le numerose paludi e altipiani.
description.tr: Hossin's dense mangrove and willow forests provide air cover along its many swamps and highlands.

description.de: Die unzhligen Wlder und felsigen Landschaften des ppigen Kontinents Amerish bieten ausreichend Deckung zwischen ihrem hgeligen Terrain und den Gebirgspssen.
description.en: Amerish's lush groves and rocky outcroppings provide ample cover between its rolling plains and mountain passes.
description.es: Las abundantes arboledas y los rocosos afloramientos de Amerish proporcionan una amplia cobertura entre sus ondulados valles y sus desfiladeros de montaa.
description.fr: Les bosquets touffus et les affleurements rocheux d'Amerish offrent une abondance d'abris entre ses plaines immenses et ses cols montagneux.
description.it: I verdi boschi e gli affioramenti rocciosi di Amerish offrono ampie possibilit di rifugio tra pianure collinose e passi montani.
description.tr: Amerish's lush groves and rocky outcroppings provide ample cover between its rolling plains and mountain passes.

description.de: Esamirs ausgedehnte, eisige Wste und die felsigen Berge bieten wenig Schutz vor Bedrohung aus der Luft.
description.en: Esamir's expanses of frigid tundra and craggy mountains provide little cover from airborne threats.
description.es: Las extensiones de tundra glacial y las escarpadas montaas de Esamir cubren poco frente a las amenazas areas.
description.fr: Les tendues de tundra froide et les montagnes escarpes d'Esamir offrent peu de protection contre les menaces ariennes.
description.it: Le distese di tundra ghiacciata e le montagne rocciose di Esamir forniscono ben poca protezione contro le minacce aeree.
description.tr: Esamir's expanses of frigid tundra and craggy mountains provide little cover from airborne threats.

description.de: Koltyr ist ein Kontinent, der mit neuen Spielern von PlanetSide 2 bevlkert ist. Koltyr beinhaltet ein exklusives Set von Zielen und Belohnungen, die dir dabei helfen werden, dich mit dem Spiel vertraut zu machen.
description.en: Koltyr is a continent that is populated with players new to Planetside 2.  Koltyr contains an exclusive set of goals and rewards that will help familiarize you with the game.
description.es: Koltyr es un continente poblado por principiantes en Planetside 2. Koltyr contiene un conjunto exclusivo de objetivos y recompensas que te ayudar a familiarizarte con el juego.
description.fr: Koltyr est un continent qui accueille les nouveaux joueurs de Planetside 2. Koltyr contient une srie d'objectifs et de rcompenses exclusive qui vous aideront  vous familiariser avec le jeu.
description.it: Koltyr  un continente popolato di giocatori appena approdati a Planetside 2. Koltyr fornisce un set esclusivo di obiettivi e premi che ti aiuteranno ad avvicinarti al gioco.
